org.apache.lucene.spatial.util

Class GeoDistanceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.spatial.util.GeoDistanceUtils

  • public class GeoDistanceUtils
extends Object
    Reusable geo-spatial distance utility methods.
    WARNING: This API is experimental and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DISTANCE_PCT_ERR
      error threshold for point-distance queries (in percent) NOTE: Guideline from USGS is 0.005

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void closestPointOnBBox(double rMinY, double rMaxY, double rMinX, double rMaxX, double lat, double lon, double[] closestPt)
      Finds the closest point within a rectangle (defined by rMinX, rMinY, rMaxX, rMaxY) to the given (lon, lat) point the result is provided in closestPt (lat, lon).
      static double distanceToDegreesLon(double lat, double distance)
      Compute the inverse haversine to determine distance in degrees longitude for provided distance in meters
      static double linearDistance(double[] pt1, double[] pt2)
      Computes distance between two points in a cartesian (x, y, {z - optional}) coordinate system
      static double maxRadialDistanceMeters(double centerLat, double centerLon)
      Returns the maximum distance/radius (in meters) from the point 'center' before overlapping

    • Method Detail

      • linearDistance

        public static double linearDistance(double[] pt1,
                                    double[] pt2)
        Computes distance between two points in a cartesian (x, y, {z - optional}) coordinate system

      • distanceToDegreesLon

        public static double distanceToDegreesLon(double lat,
                                          double distance)
        Compute the inverse haversine to determine distance in degrees longitude for provided distance in meters
        Parameters:
        lat - latitude to compute delta degrees lon
        distance - distance in meters to convert to degrees lon
        Returns:
        Sloppy distance in degrees longitude for provided distance in meters

      • closestPointOnBBox

        public static void closestPointOnBBox(double rMinY,
                                      double rMaxY,
                                      double rMinX,
                                      double rMaxX,
                                      double lat,
                                      double lon,
                                      double[] closestPt)
        Finds the closest point within a rectangle (defined by rMinX, rMinY, rMaxX, rMaxY) to the given (lon, lat) point the result is provided in closestPt (lat, lon). When the point is outside the rectangle, the closest point is on an edge or corner of the rectangle; else, the closest point is the point itself.

      • maxRadialDistanceMeters

        public static double maxRadialDistanceMeters(double centerLat,
                                             double centerLon)
        Returns the maximum distance/radius (in meters) from the point 'center' before overlapping
